channel.title: mind the gap
channel.description: This blog is a collection of tips and tricks found elsewhere, so its posts are about things perhaps I would need someday. Maybe you find something useful here too!

item.title: Mounting drive images
item.description: Recently I read about how to Mount a Raspberry Pi File System Image. The described procedure there can be applied to any drive image as long as it is not a virtual drive image (a dd image from a SD card is used there). Luckily, many time ago I found the instructions for virtual drive images.

item.title: Welcome to the gap!
item.description: Hi there! It took a long time, but finally I realised the best way to start a project is to start a small task — check out Kadavy’s post about starting small habits.
